alert.note: Alert for Allegheny; Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Indiana; Jefferson; Westmoreland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 2:02AM EDT until August 25 at 2:30AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BUTLER...INDIANA...NORTHEASTERN ALLEGHENY... JEFFERSON...NORTH CENTRAL WESTMORELAND...ARMSTRONG...EASTERN CLARION AND EASTERN FOREST COUNTIES... At 202 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Portland Mills to 7 miles northwest of Punxsutawney to near Delmont, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Indiana, Punxsutawney, Clarion, Vandergrift, Kittanning, Brookville, Marienville, Apollo, Rimersburg, Lower Burrell, Harrison Township, Tarentum, Natrona Heights, Brackenridge, Ford City, Reynoldsville, Leechburg, Brockway, Sarver, and Freeport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.

area.areaDesc: Allegheny; Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Indiana; Jefferson; Westmoreland
